Alright, since the War Of Insanity was locked, and it was becoming a story, I've made this thread to continue that story. Anyone can contribute, and Sampa, Xannari, Laythe Dweller, and Vinster, you may continue your story from where it was left off. I'm also contributing because I'm back from vacation. We'll start whenever everyone's online so they can post. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Also, this WILL become a story, so the prefix is appropriate.

And Dweller, NO MULTIVERSE!

Enjoy!

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127950-War-Of-Insanity!?highlight=War+Insanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127950-War-Of-Insanity!?highlight=War+Insanity)

The original story.

The story so far:

A galactic war began. The dominant powers are, Junior, Sampa, Xannari, Trainengie, and Vinster.

They each claimed a portion of the galaxy. They started with petty attacks, bacon feasts, and gravity messing-around-with. The first major event occurred at the center of the galaxy, where VinsterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s colony, located inside an asteroid, went critical. After much effort, VinsterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s people scattered around the blast radius and resettled in the void in the middle of the galaxy.

Sampa and Xannari made a truce, and the galaxy was at peace as they settled into an era of no conflict. It ended as soon as Sampa began raiding small enemy targets that had settled. Then Xannari became suspicious. Xannari stole blueprints for a massive ship. Xannari was nearly arrested by Sampa but Xannari responded with a threat to destroy the flagship of SampaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fleet. Xannari escaped. Xannari eventually surrendered and rejoined Sampa.

Junior joined Sampa, and they traded technology and formed an alliance. Soon, Xannari began to show odd symptoms, such as speaking of the Great attractor, the most powerful gravitational force known to man, where she had made a colony.

Strange things began to happen: The Great Attractor showed signs of meeting the same fate as the center of the galaxy; Junior completed his signature particle shield.

Xannari accuses Vinster of causing the near collapse. From then on, Xannari became a warmonger. The center of the galaxy nearly exploded again, but Junior saved everyone. Junior, while investigating the disturbance, which Sampa later identifies as a wormhole, is ambushed. Junior and the ship barely survive the attack. Xannari snaps at this point and threatens everyone with missiles.

Junior recovers and Sampa and Xannari break their alliance. Sampa takes aggressive action against Xannari, who armed her missiles. Xannari attempted to assassinate Junior and his planet with an irradiating space ship.

A massive battle ensues after Junior recovers and saves the fleet from radiation death. The combined forces of Sampa and Junior fought against and eventually imprisoned Xannari. At this point, Junior and Sampa found the Galactic Alliance and make plans to build a central station: the Citadel. This heavily defended station is created and promptly destroyed by an unknown 3rd faction.

During the Battle for the Citadel, Junior is nearly killed when shot in the back, spending a week recovering. Shortly thereafter, Sampa cracks and sets out on a personal suicide mission to put an end to Xannari's insolence. Arriving at her base, Sampa wages a brief cyber war with Xannari and then confronts her one final time. Sampa fist-fights with Xannari, ending with Sampa shooting himself in the head (If Fallout New Vegas taught us anything, you can survive a bullet in the brain.) He eventually recovers with the help of Dark\_Junior, Laythe\_Dweller, and Xannari (who disappears shortly thereafter). After, the fleet constructs Citadel 2, a replacement. The Alliance welcomes a new era of peace.

I awake from my coma, and request an update for what the heck happened while I was gone!

Sampa, I leave for ONE WEEKEND!

Lol.

But seriously, how could so much happen? Also, which villain does Xannari play this time?
